TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ViewPropertyAnimator extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class enables automatic and optimized animation of select properties on View objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.ViewPropertyAnimator SetDuration(int64 duration) cil managed

Docs.param: The length of ensuing property animations, in milliseconds. The value cannot be negative.
Docs.summary: Sets the duration for the underlying animator that animates the requested properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.ViewPropertyAnimator SetInterpolator(class Android.Animation.ITimeInterpolator interpolator) cil managed

Docs.param: The TimeInterpolator to be used for ensuing property animations. A value of null will result in linear interpolation.
Docs.summary: Sets the interpolator for the underlying animator that animates the requested properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.ViewPropertyAnimator SetStartDelay(int64 startDelay) cil managed

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Start() cil managed
